scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html CNAME main.css assets dist/ && mkdir -p dist/vendor && cp -r node_modules/skeleton-css dist/vendor && cp -r node_modules/vellum-doc dist/vendor
scripts.test: npm run lint && npx linkinator index.html -ro --recurse --skip '(.*\.grislyeye\.com)|(.*\.reddit\.com)|(.*\.twitter\.com)|(.*\.drivethrurpg\.com)' --verbosity debug
scripts.lint: npx prettier . --check && htmlhint 'index.html' && stylelint main.css assets/styles/**/*.css
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
